title: SCP: Scene Completion Pre-training for 3D Object Detection. (arXiv:2309.06199v1 [cs.CV])
abstract: 3D object detection using LiDAR point clouds is a fundamental task in the fields of computer vision, robotics, and autonomous driving. However, existing 3D detectors heavily rely on annotated datasets, which are both time-consuming and prone to errors during the process of labeling 3D bounding boxes. In this paper, we propose a Scene Completion Pre-training (SCP) method to enhance the performance of 3D object detectors with less labeled data. SCP offers three key advantages: (1) Improved initialization of the point cloud model. By completing the scene point clouds, SCP effectively captures the spatial and semantic relationships among objects within urban environments. (2) Elimination of the need for additional datasets. SCP serves as a valuable auxiliary network that does not impose any additional efforts or data requirements on the 3D detectors. (3) Reduction of the amount of labeled data for detection. With the help of SCP, the existing state-of-the-art 3D detectors can achieve compa

translated_title: SCP: 场景完整性预训练用于3D目标检测
translated_abstract: 在计算机视觉、机器人和自动驾驶等领域，使用LiDAR点云进行3D目标检测是一项基础任务。然而，现有的3D检测器严重依赖于注释数据集，这在标记3D边界框的过程中既耗时又容易出错。本文提出一种场景完整性预训练（SCP）方法，以增强使用较少标记数据的3D目标检测器的性能。SCP具有三个关键优势：（1）改善点云模型的初始化。通过完善场景点云，SCP有效捕捉城市环境中物体间的空间和语义关系。（2）消除对额外数据集的需求。SCP作为有价值的辅助网络，不会对3D检测器施加任何额外的工作或数据要求。（3）减少目标检测所需的标记数据量。借助SCP的帮助，现有的最先进3D检测器可以实现与大量标记数据相当的性能。
tldr: SCP提出了一种场景完整性预训练方法，以增强3D目标检测器的性能，包括改善点云模型的初始化、消除对额外数据集的需求和减少标记数据量。
en_tdlr: SCP introduces a scene completion pre-training method to enhance the performance of 3D object detectors, including improved initialization of the point cloud model, elimination of the need for additional datasets, and reduction of labeled data requirement.
